      Methods in com.chunkr.genetics with parameters of type Chromosome 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Chromosome<T,G> Chromosome.crossover(Chromosome<T,G> mate, double rate)
      Crosses over this chromosome with the specified mate using the specified crossover rate.
      abstract java.math.BigDecimal Configuration.getFitness(Chromosome<T,G> chromosome)
      Returns a reference to a callable object that in turn returns the fitness of this chromosome; this enables fitness calculations to be parallelized.
